column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Everything was very good but I wasn't crazy about how much oil was in everything.  I know oil is part of the cuisine but it seemed overboard.  So I knocked off one star.  Other than that
column2: the food itself was just as good as everyone says it is
column3: and the sangria is bangin.  I'll be crash dieting for the next four days before the weekend.
